title: Screen flickers in game
body:
Whenever i go in game my screen starts flickering
i don't know what i can do i was thinking my graphic card is dying but idk.
pls help

replies.body:
Do you have Windows 10
I have a similar problem, this worked:
https://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-turn-off-game-bar-windows-10-a.html
All in one - turn off the Win+G Addon. For that, log in the XBox App and select everything off (yea, annoying that you have to log in for that).

This worked for me! 

Basically,

1.Click X-Box app on your computer
2. click settings 
3. Click Game DVR
4. Turn that shit off
5. exit and gucci gang

For ppl who are lazy^^
